review: Apple TV is working better than I expected.  Easy and simple installation and setup, as I would expect from an Apple product.  I did have a problem with audio at first, but immediately found a fix online in Apple Support that took about 10 seconds to perform (simply turning my wifi off, and on again from my computer).  Total time to setup, even with the search and fix was 15 minutes.  I found ATV to have functionality and video channels beyond the music and photo/video streaming from my computer that I was wanting.  I was especially surprised to find that with AirPlay, I can use my TV as a monitor for my MacBook Pro.  I am very happy with Apple TV.
author: John J. Grimaud, MA
